name: Frosty Ice Cream Factory
description:
With Frosty Ice Cream Factory, make your own delicious ice cream at home in minutes! Create the ice cream mix you like and pour it into the ice cream machine. Simply twist the handle to create some ice cream magic! After a few minutes, you will see the texture change! Scoop the ice cream into the Frosty cups to serve your very cool frozen treats. Add any yummy toppings you like! Crunch some biscuits with Frosty biscuit cruncher, and add some sprinkles to decorate! Enjoy a perfectly tasty, chilly moment with all your friends!

- In minutes you will enjoy a delicious, ice cream treat!
- Set includes cups and spoons to serve and enjoy your yummy treats.
- Add some extra toppings in your ice cream cups and enjoy your ice cream with the funny Frosty
- 7 flavors

List of flavors,
-Strawberry
-Orange
-Guava
-Raspberry
-Blueberry
-Vanilla
-Chocolate Sprinkles

Game include,
Frozen Ice Cream Maker
Ice Cream Maker
Ice Cream Shop
Funny Ice Cream Game
Cooking Ice Creams
Ice Cream Maker Frosty
Ice Cream Maker
Cooking Ice Cream
Cone Cupcake

Frosty Ice Cream Factory will provide hours of entertainment for the kids. On a hot summer day, Frosty will keep the whole family cool! This friendly snowman comes with everything you need to create lollies, crushed ice drinks and fruity frozen shapes to enjoy and share with friends.
